conclusion: Consider gravitational force exerted by remaining part of sphere after removing smaller sphere.
Original sphere has mass M and radius R.
Smaller sphere has mass m and radius R/2.
Remaining part of sphere has mass M - m and radius R/2.
Gravitational force F is given by F = GMm/(R - R/2)^2.
Simplify expression to F = GMm/(3R/2)^2 = GMm/(9R^2/4).
